job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Job Description:</strong></p><p><strong>Minimum Qualifications</strong></p><p>- Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field.</p><p>- 1+ years’ experience with Programming Language such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications</strong></p><p>Industry experience in the following:</p><p>- Software development and System Architecture on Arm based RTOS platforms.</p><p>- Android or other High level OS for Mobile, Compute, IoT or Automotive products ( e.g. Android, Linux, Windows etc.).</p><p>- Software version control systems (such as GIT, Perforce etc.) for large scale software development.</p><p>- C /C++ programming and debug experience</p><p>- Software development for embedded platform.</p><p>- One or more of the following Modem protocols: EVDO/WCDMA/LTE/5G system architecture</p><p>- RTOS software development</p><p>- Scripting language such as Perl or Python.</p><p>- Multimedia (Audio, Video, Camera) software development/debug/integration.</p><p>- Understanding of ARM processor family and software development on ARM processors.</p><p>- Understanding of Bluetooth , Wifi ( 802.11 family) drivers and protocol.</p><p>- Embedded system debugging skills (Jtag based).</p><p>- Familiarity with modem log analysis (e.g. WCDMA, LTE, 4g, 5g etc.)</p>
